TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的資料列。

span.span: Represents a row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 類別表示中的資料列控制項。The class represents a row in a control. 這個類別可讓您控制資料列內容的顯示方式。This class allows you to control how the contents of the row are displayed. 藉由設定指定的資料列中內容的對齊和屬性。The alignment of the contents in the row are specified by setting the and properties. 您可以使用，以程式設計方式管理的資料列中的資料格集合。You can programmatically manage the cells in the row by using the collection. 集合是一堆代表資料列中的儲存格的物件。The collection is a collection of objects that represent the cells in the row. > [!CAUTION] > 控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 驗證控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                   ``` ## Examples 這個程式碼範例會建立資料表、 以程式設計方式將元素加入至資料表，和在網頁上顯示的資料表。This following code example creates a table, programmatically adds elements to the table, and displays the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體類別以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of a class programmatically. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，表示 控制項中資料列的儲存格。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the cells of a row in a control.

value.span: 物件，表示 控制項資料列中的儲存格集合。

span.span: A object that represents a collection of cells from a row of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此屬性，以程式設計方式控制的集合物件表示的資料列儲存格控制項。Use this property to programmatically control a collection of objects that represent the cells from a row of the control. 您可以透過程式設計方式新增、 插入或移除集合中的物件。You can programmatically add, insert, or remove a object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 建置時，才會使用這個屬性以程式設計方式控制。This property is only used when building controls programmatically. 在設計階段，設定這個屬性是宣告物件。At design time, this property is set by declaring objects. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例會建立資料表、 以程式設計方式將元素加入至資料表，和在網頁上顯示的資料表。This following code example creates a table, programmatically adds elements to the table, and displays the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 為 控制項建立新的 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object for the control.

returns.span: 物件，包含 控制項的子伺服器控制項。

span.span: A object that contains the control's child server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法建立新物件，包含資料格。The method creates a new object that holds the cells. 方法主要是對控制項開發人員有利，可用以擴充 控制項的功能。The method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料列中內容的水平對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents in the row.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料列內容的水平對齊。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the contents of the row. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |水平對齊方式Horizontal Alignment|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| ||水平對齊未設定。The horizontal alignment is not set.| ||靠左對齊的資料列的內容。The contents of the row are left justified.| ||置中對齊的資料列的內容。The contents of the row are centered.| ||資料列的內容靠右對齊。The contents of the row are right justified.| ||資料列的內容是一致的方式分散，且與左、 右邊界對齊。The contents of the row are uniformly spread out and aligned with both the left and right margins.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#4)]

.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };
member this.SupportsDisabledAttribute : bool

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將所轉譯 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中 物件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location for a object in a control.
A value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得或設定其中物件會置於控制項。Use the property to get or set where the object is placed in a control. 如需可用的資料表位置中，請參閱。For the available table locations, see . 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |資料表資料列區段Table row section|顯示為Displayed as| |-----------------------|------------------| ||標頭資料列。The header row.| ||在表格內文。The body of the table.| ||頁尾資料列。The footer row.| 使用宣告式語法時，區段必須按照順序標頭、 主體和頁尾。When using the declarative syntax, the sections must be in the order of header, body, and then footer. 列舉型別可讓您建置使用可存取的網站控制項，加上``， ``，和``在用戶端呈現的 html 項目。The enumeration enables you to build accessible Web sites using the control by adding the ``, ``, and `` elements to the HTML that is rendered to the client. 如果資料表中的所有資料列中``項目，區段資訊則不會呈現。If all rows in a table are in the `` element, the section information is not rendered. 在非內文項目中必須至少一個資料列。At least one row must be in a non-body element. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來定義中的頁首及頁尾資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to define header and footer rows in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableRow/CS/TableRowCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableRow/VB/TableRowVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The is not valid.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料列中內容的垂直對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the contents in the row.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料列內容的垂直對齊方式。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the contents of the row. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |垂直對齊方式Vertical Alignment|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||未設定垂直對齊方式。The vertical alignment is not set.| ||資料列的內容對齊的資料列的上方。The contents of the row are aligned with the top of the row.| ||資料列的內容對齊的資料列中間。The contents of the row are aligned with the middle of the row.| ||與資料列的底部對齊的資料列的內容。The contents of the row are aligned with the bottom of the row.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#4)]
